name: pixxel-filter
description: PixxelKick's personally maintained public poefilterx Loot Filter

scripts.build-normal: npm run build-normal-low && npm run build-normal-med && npm run build-normal-high
scripts.build-ruth: npm run build-ruth-low && npm run build-ruth-med && npm run build-ruth-high
scripts.build: npm run build-normal && npm run build-ruth
